task.title: Fix dashboard storage to match daemon (JSONL/SQLite)

events.content: Fixed Next.js optional catch-all route: Fixed Next.js optional catch-all route

raw.question: Fixed Next.js optional catch-all route
raw.reasoning: Returning empty array from generateStaticParams means 'generate no pages'. For optional catch-all routes [[...slug]], must return [{ slug: undefined }] to generate the base route.

retrospective.summary: Dashboard now uses unified storage adapter matching daemon; UI gracefully handles missing JSONL features; fixed Next.js build error with optional catch-all route
